content: the nørrebro scarf by denise twum the nørrebro scarf by denise twum sometimes you just want a quick instant size gratification project that you can finish in one 10in x 6ft approx evening this scarf complements the nørrebro hat and is just that kind of project combining yarn simple ribbing with a sand stitch for the perfect loops & threads cozy wool 50% squishy unisex scarf acrylic 50% wool 90yd 82m /127g 6oz 3 balls moss green both the hat and scarf patterns are named after lion brand wool-ease thick & nørrebro the suburb of copenhagen where i quick 80% acrylic 20% wool saw a lady rocking a similar- looking hat to the 108yd 99m /170g 6oz 2 5 balls nørrebro hat #503 granite needles us #13 straight or circular needles notes 1x1 ribbing k1 p1 2x2 ribbing k2 p2 sand stitch worked back and forth 1 k1 p1 repeat to last st slip st with yarn in front 2 k1 purl to last st slip st with yarn in front instructions bio edging denise was introduced to cast on 20 sts knitting by her supervisor while working at her college s science work 1x1 or 2x2 ribbing for 3-4 inches then library in 2006 switch to main body pattern sand stitch knitting kept her company as main body she traveled to five countries for repeat the two row of the sand stitch pattern a year of independent research until the scarf is between almost 6ft long 5ft and she s been addicted ever 8in or 67-68 in long ending on row 2 since edging you will find her watching a work 3-4 more inches of 1x1 or 2x2 ribbing lengthy bollywood movie or korean drama while knitting finishing you can contact her and keep bind off loosely and weave in ends up with her knitting exploits at lightly steam block if you d like www niseyknits com ©niseyknits 2015 3 pattern for personal and charity use only pattern not to be reproduced for resale items made from pattern can be sold for profit with prior written permission from designer for questions or comments please send an email to niseyknits@gmail com
